question: Which among the following is a correct difference between the Mughal Paintings and Rajput Paintings?
option1: While the central theme of Mughal Paintings was Mughals splendour and pomp, the central theme of Rajput paintings was Rajput splendour and chivalry
option2: While Mughal Paintings had independent origin, Rajput paintings originated from Mughal style
option3: Material aspect of animal life is more prominently depicted in Mughal paintings in comparison to Rajput Paintings
option4: None of the above is a correct statement
answer: Material aspect of animal life is more prominently depicted in Mughal paintings in comparison to Rajput Paintings
